tool_description: Evaluates hair damage severity by analyzing breakage patterns, texture changes, elasticity, and visual indicators to determine repair needs.

breakage_frequency.description: Hair breakage occurrence: rare, occasional, frequent, constant

split_end_severity.description: Split end level: minimal, moderate, extensive, severe

elasticity_test_result.description: Hair elasticity: good, fair, poor, very_poor

error_messages: Invalid breakage frequency: Must be one of [rare, occasional, frequent, constant]
Invalid split end severity: Must be one of [minimal, moderate, extensive, severe]
Invalid elasticity result: Must be one of [good, fair, poor, very_poor]
Invalid texture changes: Must be descriptive text strings
Too many texture changes: Maximum 10 texture changes can be specified
usage: Provide breakage frequency, texture changes, split end severity, and elasticity test results. Optionally specify color fading and heat damage signs. Returns comprehensive damage assessment with repair recommendations.

damage_type.description: Primary damage category: mechanical, chemical, thermal, or environmental
